Blade Mail.name: Blade Mail
descriptions: When struck in combat inflicts up to 12 (damage scales with your level) damage to the attacker.
When struck in combat inflicts up to 24 (damage scales with your level) damage to the attacker.
When struck in combat inflicts up to 36 (damage scales with your level) damage to the attacker.

Concussion Blow.name: Concussion Blow
descriptions:
A brutal strike that stuns the opponent for dIndex=35.
This ability causes a high amount of threat.

Constitution.name: Constitution
descriptions: Increases your Strength and Agility by up to 1% of your current Health. Also if you have more than 50% of your Health you become immune to Diseases and if more than 75% to Poisons.

Butterfly Style.name: Butterfly Style
descriptions: Increases your chances to dodge and to get a critical strike by 1% and makes your dodges and parries generate 50% of Rage.
Increases your chances to dodge and to get a critical strike by 2% and makes your dodges and parries generate 100% of Rage.
Increases your chances to dodge and to get a critical strike by 3% and makes your dodges and parries generate 150% of Rage.
Increases your chances to dodge and to get a critical strike by 4% and makes your dodges and parries generate 200% of Rage.
Increases your chances to dodge and to get a critical strike by 5% and makes your dodges and parries generate 250% of Rage.

Vitality.name: Vitality
descriptions: Increases your total Health and healing taken by 2%.
Increases your total Health and healing taken by 4%.
Increases your total Health and healing taken by 6%.
Increases your total Health and healing taken by 8%.
Increases your total Health and healing taken by 10%.

Improved Shield Wall.name: Improved Shield Wall
descriptions: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall by 5 secs and reduces its cooldown by 25%.
Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall by 10 secs and reduces its cooldown by 50%.

Training and Discipline.name: Training and Discipline
descriptions: Reduces the cost of all your abilities by $/10;s1 rage point.
Reduces the cost of all your abilities by $/10;s1 rage point.
Reduces the cost of all your abilities by $/10;s1 rage point.

Shield Toss.name: Shield Toss
descriptions:
Hurls a shield at the enemy, causing 69 damage, increased by Attack Power and knocks down for dIndex=39.
This ability causes a high amount of threat.

One-Handed Weapon Specialization.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 6%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 8%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 10%.

Defiance.name: Defiance
descriptions: Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 3% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 6% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 9% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 12% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 15% while in Defensive Stance.

Iron Will.name: Iron Will
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 10%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 20%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 30%.

Mocker.name: Mocker
descriptions: Improves your chance to hit with Taunt, Challenging Shout and Mocking Blow abilities by 3%.
Improves your chance to hit with Taunt, Challenging Shout and Mocking Blow abilities by 6%.

Shield Mastery.name: Shield Mastery
descriptions: Allows your Shield Block and Shield Reflection abilities to block/reflect an additional attack/spell and reduces their cooldowns by $S2%.
Allows your Shield Block and Shield Reflection abilities to block/reflect an additional attack/spell and reduces their cooldowns by $S2%.
Allows your Shield Block and Shield Reflection abilities to block/reflect an additional attack/spell and reduces their cooldowns by $S2%.

Last Stand.name: Last Stand
descriptions: Heals yourself for 20% of your maximum health, and increases your maximum health by 20% for 20 sec.

Improved Revenge.name: Improved Revenge
descriptions: Gives your Revenge ability a 15% chance to stun the target for $12798d.
Gives your Revenge ability a 30% chance to stun the target for $12798d.
Gives your Revenge ability a 45% chance to stun the target for $12798d.

Improved Shield Bash.name: Improved Shield Bash
descriptions: Reduces the cost of your Shield Bash by $/10;s2 rage points and gives it a 50% chance to silence the target for $18498d.
Reduces the cost of your Shield Bash by $/10;s2 rage points and gives it a 100% chance to silence the target for $18498d.

Shield Specialization.name: Shield Specialization
descriptions: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and has a 20% chance to restore 1% of your health when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 2% and has a 40% chance to restore 1% of your health when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 3% and has a 60% chance to restore 1% of your health when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 4% and has a 80% chance to restore 1% of your health when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 5% and has a 100% chance to restore 1% of your health when a block occurs.

Anticipation.name: Anticipation
descriptions: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by 1%.
Reduces the chance you are critically hit by 2%.
Reduces the chance you are critically hit by 3%.

Toughness.name: Toughness
descriptions: Increases your armor value from items by 3%.
Increases your armor value from items by 6%.
Increases your armor value from items by 9%.
Increases your armor value from items by 12%.
Increases your armor value from items by 15%.

Improved Bloodrage.name: Improved Bloodrage
descriptions: Increases the instant Rage generated by your Bloodrage by $/10;s1, reduces cooldown by 10 sec and reduces its cost by 25%.
Increases the instant Rage generated by your Bloodrage by $/10;s1, reduces cooldown by 20 sec and reduces its cost by 50%.
